14 Inch x 40 Inch Gearhead metal lathe

  • Powerful 2 HP motor 2” spindle bore capacity
  • Safety guard with limit switch protection Line interruption switch system needs a restart after a power failure

entry.title: King Canada KC-1620CLM - Lathe/Mill Combo 16 Inch x 20 Inch (110V)
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type:
Price: 3901.22

[shortdesc]

16 Inch x 20 Inch Combo lathe/mill

  • Two powerful 3/4 HP 110V motors
  • Lathe chuck and drill chuck safety guards with limit switch protection and standard tool post safety guard
  • Easily change from Lathe mode to Mill mode
  • Forward/reverse switch for both operating modes
  • Bedways are hardened and precision ground
  • Comes with 5”- 3 jaw chuck, imperial and metric change gears, quick change tool post, steady rest, follow rest, thread chasing dial indicator, MT#3 and MT#4 dead centres, 1/2” drill chuck and tool box with adjusting tools
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada
    DISTANCE BETWEEN CENTRES 20 Inch
    SWING OVER BED AND CARRIAGE 16-1/2" / 11-1/2"
    SPINDLE BORE 1-1/8"
    HEADSTOCK/TAILSTOCK TAPERS MT#4 / MT#3
    CROSS SLIDE TRAVEL 8"
    LATHE SPINDLE SPEEDS 7 (160-1,360 RPM)
    THREAD CUTTING RANGE 36 (4-120 TPI) 22 (0.2-6mm)
    AUTOMATIC FEEDING RANGE 0.002-0.014" / 0.05-0.35mm
    DRILLING/FACE MILL/END MILL CAPACITIES 7/8" / 1-1/8" / 3-1/8"
    MAX. DISTANCE SPINDLE NOSE TO MILLING TABLE 12"
    DRILLING SPEEDS 16 (120-3,000 RPM)
    MOTORS (LATHE/MILL) 3/4 HP, 110V, 9 Amp., 1 phase, 60 Hz
    ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS (LXWXH) / WEIGHT 43" x 19-1/2" x 38" / 515 lbs
    PACKAGE DIMENSIONS (LXWXH) / WEIGHT 45" x 23" x 42" / 615 lbs

entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type:
Price: 394.83

[shortdesc]

Wood lathe safety guard

  • Offers complete safety against wood chips, broken tools, projected workpieces, dust as well as a variety of other risk factors
  • Height of support column can be adjusted to suit the clearance needed depending on the size of your wood lathe If your wood lathe does not come with mounting holes, mounting holes will need to be drilled and tapped

entry.title: King Canada KWL-1643ABC - Lathe, Wood 16" x 43", Electronic Variable Speed KWL-1643ABC
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type:
Price: 3901.22

[shortdesc]

16'' x 43'' Wood lathe with electronic variable speed

  • Powerful 2 HP, 220V, 3 phase motor with 110V, single phase input power converter
  • Heavy-duty precision cast iron bed and stand legs ensure stability and minimize operating vibrations
  • Electronic inverter controls the variable speed range from 45 - 3,750 RPM
  • Headstock swivels 360° with positive stops at 45°, 90°, 135°, 180° and 270° for outboard turning
  • Spindle speed digital readout for precise turning speed
  • Emergency stop switch with magnetic backing can be positioned anywhere on the cast iron bed
  • Forward/reverse spindle rotation 36 x 10° indexing positions
  • Comes complete with 6” face plate, 14” tool rest with offset and base, MT#2 headstock spur and tailstock live centres, knock out bar and adjustment wrenches
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada

entry.title: King Canada MA-1075ST - Hollow Chisel Mortiser, Tilting Head, 1" MA-1075ST
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type:
Price: 2475.86

[shortdesc]

1'' Hollow chisel mortiser with tilting head

  • Powerful 1 HP 110V/220V dual voltage motor 1/4” to 1” chisel and bit capacity
  • Large longitudinal and transversal 19” x 12-1/2” sliding table prevents unnecessary repositionning and reclamping of the workpiece
  • Gas head cylinder for smooth and controlled cuts
  • Rack and pinion gears move entire head for maximum leverage and positive feed control
  • Adjustable depth and height stops Includes chisel adapter bushings which accept 5/8” and 3/4” diameter chisel shanks
  • Multi-position feed handle
  • Comes complete with mortising chisel and bit set (1/4”, 3/8”, 1/2” and 3/4”), chisel adapter bushings, 1/2” chuck and key
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada
